summary: Henry is a handsome screenwriter who is trying to win the heart of the woman he truly loves. His plans are interrupted when he finds Magdalena, a little girl at his house.
cast: Numan Acar|Meret Becker|Gode Benedix|Anne-Sophie Briest|Samuel Finzi|Jasmin Gerat|Anna Julia Antonucci|Friederike Kempter|Torsten Künstler|Mimi Fiedler|Misel Maticevic|Genoveva Mayer|Sönke Möhring|Jana Reinermann|Jessica Richter|Til Schweiger|Emma Schweiger|Luna Schweiger|Katharina Thalbach|Sanny van Heteren|Johann von Bülow|Richard von Groeling|Jahmar Walker|Ulrich Wickert|Birthe Wolter|Fahri Yardim|David Akinloye|Nicole Lechmann|Alexander Yassin
keywords: coq au vin|germany|written and directed by cast member|mother daughter relationship|father daughter relationship
title: Padre a la fuerza
